name: Negroni
description: Composed of gin, sweet vermouth, and Campari, the Negroni is the classic three-ingredient cocktail.
steps: Shake gin, sweet vermouth, and Campari in cocktail shaker with ice until well chilled.
Strain into a rocks glass over a large rock.
footnote: As a bonus, drop in a Maraschino cherry on a cocktail stick.
